# ============================================
# Test Script: Infinite Loop (Timeout Test)
# ============================================
# This verifies that:
# 1. The 5-second timeout works correctly
# 2. The container is killed when time exceeds
# 3. Status is set to 'timeout' in MongoDB
# ============================================

import time

print("Starting infinite loop...")
print("This should be killed after 5 seconds.")

counter = 0
while True:
    counter += 1
    if counter % 10 == 0:
        print(f"Still running... iteration {counter}")
    time.sleep(0.1)
